officialEntries.name: sentry
officialEntries.title: Sentry
officialEntries.description: This service provides a Model Context Provider (MCP) for interacting with Sentry's API.

officialEntries.name: thena
officialEntries.title: Thena
officialEntries.description: A Model Context Protocol server that enables AI assistants to interact with Thena's services, providing seamless integration and enhanced capabilities for AI-powered applications.

officialEntries.name: nuxt
officialEntries.title: Nuxt
officialEntries.description: Access Nuxt documentation and modules with the public Nuxt MCP server

officialEntries.name: square
officialEntries.title: Square
officialEntries.description: This project follows the Model Context Protocol standard, allowing AI assistants to interact with Square's connect API.

officialEntries.name: zapier
officialEntries.title: Zapier MCP
officialEntries.description: Connect your AI assistant to over 7,000+ apps and 30,000+ actions without complex API integrations. Zapier MCP gives your AI direct access to real-world actions across essential business tools like Slack, Google Workspace, HubSpot, and thousands more.

officialEntries.name: mayar
officialEntries.title: Mayar MCP Server
officialEntries.description: Powerful Model Context Protocol server for seamless payment processing, customer management, and transaction handling integration. Provides 17 tools across 6 categories including invoice management, customer management, transaction tracking, and membership management.

communityEntries.name: discord
communityEntries.title: Discord
communityEntries.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for the Discord API (JDA), allowing seamless integration of Discord Bot with MCP-compatible applications like Claude Desktop. Enable your AI assistants to seamlessly interact with Discord. Manage channels, send messages, and retrieve server information effortlessly. Enhance your Discord experience with powerful automation capabilities.
